details:
OpenConnect, a VPN software, had a buffer overflow, causing a denial of
service (application crash) or possibly unspecified other impact, via
crafted certificate data to get\_cert\_name in gnutls.c.


For Debian 8 Jessie, this problem has been fixed in version
6.00-2+deb8u2.


We recommend that you upgrade your openconnect packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
